other_tests.findings: Initial exhaled carbon monoxide level was 21 ppm; post-relapse level was 25 ppm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Reduced carbon monoxide levels were observed over the next year after several quit attempts.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serum Blood Nicotine and Cotinine Levels Test
other_tests.findings: Serum blood nicotine level was 28 ng/ml and cotinine level was 337 ng/ml.

other_tests.date: Started treatment in the next year after initial visit
other_tests.findings: Preferred nicotine nasal spray with 40 doses per day, consuming significant amounts exceeding recommended limits.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Reported no nicotine toxicity or symptoms, but increased attempts to quit were observed over an 18-month period.

other_tests.findings: Expired carbon monoxide readings consistently less than 3 ppm, confirming smoking abstinence.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant improvements in mental status and functioning noted since 2003.

other_tests.findings: Evaluation was normal after long-term use of nicotine nasal spray.
